faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp brown sugar?
Is brown sugar healthier than white?
faqs.a: Similar calories; brown has trace molasses for minor minerals, but both are mostly sugar.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 tbsp brown sugar?
faqs.a: About 13.2 g of sugars, nearly all carbs.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have fiber or protein?
faqs.a: No fiber or protein; it's pure carbs from sucrose.

faqs.q: How does packing affect calories in brown sugar?
faqs.a: Packed tbsp is denser (~12 g, 52 kcal); unpacked is lighter (~10 g, ~43 kcal).
